title: Public Administration Challenges in the World of AI and Bots
research_description: This article discusses the challenges public administration faces due to rapid advancements in artificial intelligence and bots. It outlines the disruption caused by AI technologies in public administration, with a focus on governance, job displacement, and ethical issues. The paper highlights how public administrators need to adapt to these changes to better serve their constituents.
research_results: The study emphasizes the transformative potential of AI in public administration, but also the significant challenges, including job loss, governance issues, and ethical concerns. AI and bots can bring efficiency, but they also raise questions about privacy, bias, and the role of humans in governance.
future_research: Future research should focus on the ethical and legal frameworks necessary to govern AI and bots in the public sector, as well as exploring the long-term impact of AI on public employment and services.
